content: work from side-to-side in one piece using a self-striping shade of caron latte cakes to complete this soft crochet cardigan the vertical stripes are effortless thanks to the yarn so simply select a shade that speaks to you as you stitch this easy-to-wear open-front cardigan you ll practice half_double_crochet single_crochet in the back loop edging cuff ribbing and more the pattern is given in 6 sizes to ensure a custom fit **sizing notes** bust measurement * xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm * m 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm * l 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm * xl 44-46 112-117 cm * 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm * 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm finished bust measurement * xs/s 38 96 5 cm * m 42 106 5 cm * l 45 114 5 cm * xl 50 127 cm * 2/3 xl 58 147 cm * 4/5 xl 64 162 5 cm
